project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, tracks their score, and displays it at the end. Questions and answers will be stored as variables inside the code.

task.name: Implement the core structure of the quiz game, including question display and user input handling
Create a set of multiple-choice questions and their answers
Implement scoring logic to keep track of correct answers
Display the final score to the user at the end of the game
Write tests for the quiz game features to ensure proper functionality
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure they function correctly
